                    Caption ="Delete Award Groups and Prizes  for Current Award"
                    GUID = Begin
                        0x78da9fa8b4c5fa48a0d788e37fe08d73
                    End
                    LayoutCachedLeft =10200
                    LayoutCachedTop =1440
                    LayoutCachedWidth =12300
                    LayoutCachedHeight =1845
                End
                Begin Label
                    OverlapFlags =87
                    Left =1560
                    Top =4500
                    Width =2175
                    Height =210
                    Name ="Label72"
                    Caption ="Used for Awards booklet Etc."
                    GUID = Begin
                        0xc747388f81569c4dbb3467e8a0fc0219
                    End
                    LayoutCachedLeft =1560
                    LayoutCachedTop =4500
                    LayoutCachedWidth =3735
                    LayoutCachedHeight =4710
                End
            End
        End
    End
End
CodeBehindForm
Attribute VB_GlobalNameSpace = False
Attribute VB_Creatable = True
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = True
Attribute VB_Exposed = False

'    the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
'    (at your option) any later version.

'    but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
'    MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
'    GNU General Public License for more details.

'    along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
' Awards Edit Add, Delete Form
'   NOte code for Group and Prize sub forms are in those form's code
'  First code done 070102
Option Compare Database
Option Explicit
Private HoldCRCState As Boolean ' current state of 'Confirm Record Change' option
Private dbSciFair As Database
Private criteria As String
Private msg As String
Private Title As String
'Private DidDelete As Boolean
Private DidAdd As Boolean
Private ctlPrevFocus As Control
Private TAN As Long
Private TANam As String
Private didGrpGIDChange As Boolean

Private DonorPersonsRS As Recordset



Private Sub btnAdd_Click()
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acNewRec
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelete_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  'MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnDelete_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnDelete_Click
     Dim DeleteLast As Boolean
      DeleteLast = False
     ' DidDelete = False
      If Me.Recordset.RecordCount = Me.CurrentRecord Then  'last record
       
        DeleteLast = True
      End If
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, 8, , acMenuVer70  'Select Record
      DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, 6, , acMenuVer70  'Delete if return false then error
      If DeleteLast = True Then ' Stupid Bill Gates went to add new record - dumbshit
        'On Error Resume Next '
        'DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, acUndo, , acMenuVer70
        'On Error GoTo Err_btnDelete_Click
        DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
        DeleteLast = False
      End If
      On Error Resume Next ' Skip all messages re not able to focus
     'DidDelete = True
      Me.Requery
      ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnDelete_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnDelete_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnDelete_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnFirst_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnFirst_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnFirst_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acFirst
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnFirst_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnFirst_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnFirst_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnLast_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
 ' MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnLast_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnLast_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acLast
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnLast_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnLast_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnLast_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnNext_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  'MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnNext_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnNext_Click
    If Me.CurrentRecord = Me.Recordset.RecordCount Then
       MsgBox "End of Data!"
       ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
       Exit Sub
    End If
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acNext
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnNext_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnNext_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnNext_Click
End Sub

Private Sub btnPrev_MouseDown(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Set ctlPrevFocus = Screen.PreviousControl
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  'MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub btnPrev_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnPrev_Click
    DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
    On Error Resume Next
    ctlPrevFocus.SetFocus
Exit_btnPrev_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnPrev_Click:
    Dim errnum As Long
    errnum = Err.Number
    If Err.Number = 2105 Then  ' can not go to specified record
       errnum = Err.Number
       'Exit Sub
    End If
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnPrev_Click
End Sub
Private Sub btnUndo_MouseMove(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, x As Single, Y As Single)
  ' TouchedUndo = True
End Sub
Private Sub btnUndo_Click()

On Error GoTo Err_btnUndo_Click
  ' If IsNull(Me.EXN) And IsNull(Me.cbStudent) Then
  '   DoCmd.GoToRecord , , acPrevious
  '   Exit Sub
  ' End If
   DoCmd.DoMenuItem acFormBar, acEditMenu, acUndo, , acMenuVer70
Exit_btnUndo_Click:
    Exit Sub
Err_btnUndo_Click:
    Dim errnum As Long
    errnum = Err.Number
    If Err.Number = 2046 Or Err.Number = 2009 Then  ' command undo not available
      Exit Sub
    End If
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnUndo_Click
End Sub


Private Sub AN_AfterUpdate()
  Dim ctlPrevFocus  As Control
  Dim holdGID   ' GID for each group attached to the AN (each have new AN)
  Dim holdGN    ' GN for each group
  Dim GroupRS As Recordset
  On Error GoTo SubError
   criteria = "SELECT * FROM AwardGroup WHERE AN = " & Me.AN
   If IsNull(Me.AN.OldValue) Then ' New AN in new record no groups exist
     ' Do nothing for now
   Else  '  Changed AN  - Change GID in Group which cascades to Prizes
    Me.Refresh  ' Required to force the cascade update of group records
    Set GroupRS = CurrentDb().OpenRecordset(criteria, dbOpenDynaset)
    With GroupRS
     '.MoveFirst
     If .EOF Then
       MsgBox "Error in AN_AfterUpdate found EOF (Please call Dennis)"
       Exit Sub
     Else
       .MoveFirst
       Do While Not .EOF
          holdGID = !GID
         .Edit
          holdGN = holdGID - 100 * Int(holdGID / 100)
          !GID = 100 * Me.AN + holdGN
         .Update
         .MoveNext
       Loop
       Me.Refresh
     End If
     .Close
     didGrpGIDChange = True
    End With
  End If  ' If set an in new record
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub AN_Enter()
   ' Rev 5.3.0
   On Error GoTo SubErr

   If IsNull(Me.AN) Or Me.AN = 0 Then ' only if not set---  '  FIND An UNUSED AN--
    'If DidDelete = False Then  '  Not necessary delete check later is just deleted an award.
      
      MsgBox "To Assign 'Next Available Award Number' Click OK." & vbCrLf & _
      "You May Change It Later. "
      Dim rsAwds As Recordset
      Dim anNum As Integer
      Dim ii As Integer
      Dim maxAN As Integer
      Dim crit As String
      Set rsAwds = CurrentDb.OpenRecordset("AwardMaster", dbOpenDynaset)
      rsAwds.sort = "Sort by AN"
      maxAN = 9999  ' search for any 4 digit judge number new
      For anNum = 1 To maxAN
       With rsAwds
         .FindFirst ("[AN] = " & anNum)
         If .NoMatch Then
           Exit For  ' this is one to use
         End If
       End With
      Next anNum
      If anNum > 9999 Then
        MsgBox "No available Award Numbers less than 9999)"
      End If
      Me.AN = anNum
     ' Me.Award_Name.SetFocus  Can not do this while in enter  sorry
      DoEvents
    'End If   ' if did delete = false end here else if true goes to next so set it false
    'DidDelete = False
   End If
   Exit Sub
SubErr:
   MsgBox "error finding next avail. AN" & Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub btn_ReQuery_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btn_Refresh_Click
 Dim tempan As Integer
 Dim tempgn As Integer
 Dim temppn As Integer
  tempan = Me.AN

  Me.Requery
  Me.Recordset.FindFirst "AN = " & tempan ' Edit This?
  If Me.Recordset.NoMatch Then
  ' MsgBox "No Such Award Number", vbOKOnly  ' do not need this really and causes problems
  End If
  Me.cbAwdNum = Null ' No Edits or replacement on this line
  Me.AN.SetFocus ' Replace / Edit this
  DonorPersonsRS.Requery
  Call Form_Current
Exit_btn_Refresh_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_btn_Refresh_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btn_Refresh_Click
    
End Sub











Private Sub btnOpenDonors_Click()
On Error GoTo Err_btnOpenDonors_Click

    Dim stDocName As String
    Dim stLinkCriteria As String

    stDocName = "xAwardDonors Edit, Add, Delete FRM"
    DoCmd.OpenForm stDocName, , , stLinkCriteria

Exit_btnOpenDonors_Click:
    Exit Sub

Err_btnOpenDonors_Click:
    MsgBox Err.Description
    Resume Exit_btnOpenDonors_Click
    
End Sub



Private Sub cbAwdName_Enter()
  Me.cbAwdName.Requery
End Sub
Private Sub cbAwdName_AfterUpdate()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If IsNull(cbAwdName) Then
     'MsgBox "Nothing Selected!"
     'cbFindStudent.SetFocus
     Exit Sub
  End If
  Me.Recordset.FindFirst "AN = " & Str(Me![cbAwdName]) ' Edit This?
  If Me.Recordset.NoMatch Then
    MsgBox "No Such Award Name", vbOKOnly
  End If
  Me.cbAwdName = Null ' No Edits or replacement on this line
  Me.AN.SetFocus ' Replace / Edit this
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub


Private Sub cbAwdNum_Enter()
  Me.cbAwdNum.Requery
End Sub
Private Sub cbAwdNum_AfterUpdate()
  On Error GoTo SubError
  If IsNull(cbAwdNum) Then
     'MsgBox "Nothing Selected!"
     'cbFindStudent.SetFocus
     Exit Sub
  End If
  Me.Recordset.FindFirst "AN = " & Str(Me![cbAwdNum]) ' Edit This?
  If Me.Recordset.NoMatch Then
    MsgBox "No Such Award Number", vbOKOnly
  End If
  Me.cbAwdNum = Null ' No Edits or replacement on this line
  Me.AN.SetFocus ' Replace / Edit this
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub


Private Sub Form_Current()
  ' this same code in Group and Prize.  If edit this, edit those
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Dim pink As Long
  Dim green As Long
  pink = 13356030
  green = 65408
  ' Rev 2.3.4
  With DonorPersonsRS
   '    .FindFirst ("[Status] = 'A'")
   '  If Not .NoMatch Then oneActive = True
   '  .FindFirst ("[Status] Is Null OR [Status] <> 'A'")
   '  If Not .NoMatch Then oneInactive = True
   '  .FindFirst ("[Status] = 'A' AND (isnull([ScriptAssy]) OR [ScriptAssy] = 'X')")
   '  If Not .NoMatch Then oneError = True
  
  
    '.MoveFirst
   
    .FindFirst ("AwardDonors.[AN] = " & Me.AN)
     If .NoMatch Then
         Me.txtDID.BackColor = 255
         Me.txtDID = " NO DONOR! "
         Me.txtDonor = ""
      Else
         Me.txtDID.BackColor = 16777215
         Me.txtDID = "Donor:"
         Me.txtDonor = !FNAME & " " & !LNAME
         '  ---   Rev 5.3.0
         Dim Numdonors As Integer
         Numdonors = 1
         Do While Not .EOF
            .FindNext ("AwardDonors.[AN] = " & Me.AN)
            If .NoMatch Then
               Exit Do
            Else
            Numdonors = Numdonors + 1
               Me.txtDID = Numdonors & " Donors:"
               Me.txtDonor = Me.txtDonor & ", " & !FNAME & " " & !LNAME
            End If
         Loop
      End If
  End With
  If Me.NewRecord Then
    Me.AN.BackColor = pink
    Me.Award_Name.SetFocus
 
    DoEvents
    Me.AN.SetFocus
    DoEvents
   ' DidDelete = False
  Else
    Me.AN.BackColor = green
    FillValueSum (Me.AN)  ' located in module functions
  End If
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub Form_Open(Cancel As Integer)
   On Error GoTo SubError
   ' Rev 2.3.4  Open a query to get Donor Information
     Set dbSciFair = CurrentDb()
     Set DonorPersonsRS = dbSciFair.OpenRecordset("xAwards Donor Query (All fields)", dbOpenDynaset)
     DonorPersonsRS.OpenRecordset
    
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub

Private Sub STATUS_Exit(Cancel As Integer)
' NOTE: Setting to upper case is mostly for visual consistency. It is not
'       required for finding and matching as is was in dBase!
    On Error GoTo SubError
    If IsNull(Me.[STATUS]) Then
       If Me.STATUS.OldValue = "A" Then
         Call ScifairLog("Chg Award STATUS 'A' to Blank - Awd: ", Me.AN, IIf(IsNull(Me.Award_Name), " ", Mid(Me.Award_Name, 1, 49)))
       End If
       Exit Sub ' no need to do upper case check
    End If
    If Asc(Me.[STATUS]) <> Asc(UCase(Me.[STATUS])) Then ' do only not ucase
      Me.[STATUS] = UCase(Me.[STATUS])
    End If
    If Me.STATUS.OldValue = "A" And Me.STATUS <> "A" Then
        Call ScifairLog("Chg Award STATUS 'A' to " & Me.STATUS & _
                   " - AN: ", Me.AN, IIf(IsNull(Me.Award_Name), " ", Mid(Me.Award_Name, 1, 49)))
    End If
    Exit Sub
SubError:
    MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Delete(Cancel As Integer)
   ' This plus Sub Form_BeforeDelConfirm work to ALWAYS show a delete message
   ' Even if user has turned off the warning messages.
   On Error GoTo SubError
   msg = "CAUTION: Deleting an Award will delete all Groups" & vbCrLf & _
         "and prizes for that Award " & vbCrLf & vbCrLf & _
         "DELETE AWARD/Groups/Prizes?"
   If MsgBox(msg, vbYesNo + vbDefaultButton2, Title) = vbNo Then
      Cancel = True
      Exit Sub
   End If
  'DidDelete = True   ' Indicate did a delete of the award  not needed and causes problems
   TAN = Me.AN        ' save award num for log
   TANam = IIf(IsNull(Me.Name), " ", Mid(Me.Name, 1, 49)) ' name for log
   Exit Sub  ' Judge record will be deleted on exit
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_BeforeDelConfirm(Cancel As Integer, Response As Integer)
   ' This suppresses the system confirmation message, I give message in
   ' Sub Form_Delete (
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Response = acDataErrContinue
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_AfterDelConfirm(STATUS As Integer)
  ' You must do :me.Application.SetOption "Confirm RecordChanges",True
  '   Or this Routine is NEVER CALLED!
  ' This code used to delete other related records
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Call ScifairLog("Del Award/Grps/Przs AN: ", TAN, TANam)
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Load()
  ' The next statements give a type mismatch error unless or until
  ' I fixed the priority of references in the Visual Basic Tools option.
  ' Sequence must be:
  ' Visual Basic for Applications
  ' Microsoft Access 9.0 Library
  ' Microsoft Office 9.0 Library
  ' OLE Automation
  ' Microsoft DAO 3.6 Obj Lib
  ' Microsoft Visual Basic of Application Extensibility 5.3
  '  Others as needed
  On Error GoTo SubError
  Me.Rev.Caption = RevisionDate
  Title = "Awards Edit"
  ' This is Required If any Work is done in me.AfterDeleteConfirm_Click Action
  HoldCRCState = Me.Application.GetOption("Confirm Record Changes")
  Me.Application.SetOption "Confirm Record Changes", True
 ' DidDelete = False
  'DidAdd = False
  'Me.Rev.Caption = RevisionDate
  Exit Sub
SubError:
  MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Close()
   On Error GoTo SubError
   Me.Application.SetOption "Confirm Record Changes", HoldCRCState
   DonorPersonsRS.Close  'Rev2.3.4
   Exit Sub
SubError:
   MsgBox Err.Description
End Sub
